005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * A base class for an assembly instance defined inline.
014 *
015 * @param <PARENT>
016 *          the Java type of the parent model container for this instance
017 * @param <DEFINITION>
018 *          the Java type of the related assembly definition
019 * @param <INSTANCE>
020 *          the expected Java type of an instance of this definition
021 * @param <PARENT_DEFINITION>
022 *          the Java type of the containing assembly definition
023 * @param <FLAG>
024 *          the expected Java type of flag children
025 */
026public abstract class AbstractInlineFieldDefinition<
027    PARENT extends IContainerModel,
028    DEFINITION extends IFieldDefinition,
029    INSTANCE extends IFieldInstance,
030    PARENT_DEFINITION extends IAssemblyDefinition,
031    FLAG extends IFlagInstance>
032    extends AbstractNamedModelInstance<PARENT, PARENT_DEFINITION>
033    implements IFieldInstance, IFieldDefinition,
034    IFeatureContainerFlag<FLAG>,
035    IFeatureDefinitionInstanceInlined<DEFINITION, INSTANCE> {
036
037  /**
038   * Construct a new inline assembly definition.
039   *
040   * @param parent
041   *          the parent model containing this instance
042   */
043  protected AbstractInlineFieldDefinition(@NonNull PARENT parent) {
044    super(parent);
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public final DEFINITION getDefinition() {
049    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public boolean isInline() {
054    return true;
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  @NonNull
059  public final INSTANCE getInlineInstance() {
060    return ObjectUtils.asType(this);
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  public final FLAG getJsonKey() {
065    return IFeatureContainerFlag.super.getJsonKey();
066  }
067}
